Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
This is the name of the wildlife race. Both Single and Plural.
This is the name of a unit.

“When I was a child, I had a friend I ignorantly thought was a lady bug. It was actually a tick. Later, I befriended an alien beetle larva. It destroyed everything I loved. My life became a cautionary tale. Still, I persisted, studying harder, learning more. Now, I’ve made the discovery of a lifetime: psionic-crystalline lifeforms I originally named Psionica Derekus. Turns out, it’s a deadly parasite. It just consumed my grad-students. I give up! I’m renaming it to what it is. Just a stupid Tick! I should’ve been an accountant.” – Dr. Derek Hampton, “RV-2990484X: Personal Memoirs: Why Xenomorphic-Entymology Sucks.”

“当我还是个孩子的时候，我有一个朋友。我无知地以为它是一只瓢虫。实际上，它是一只蜱虫。后来，我又和一个外星甲虫的幼虫成了朋友，结果它毁了我所爱的一切。我的生活变成了一个寓言故事。不过，我仍然坚持更加努力地学习。现在，我有了毕生的发现：一种我最初将其命名为‘Psionica Derekus’的生命形态。事实证明，这是一种极为致命的寄生虫，它吃掉了我的研究生。我放弃了！我打算以它本来的样子为它重新命名，就是一只愚蠢的蜱虫而已！当初我就该去当一名会计。”——德里克·汉普顿博士，“RV-2990484X：个人回忆录：外星生命体起源学说为何而差劲。”

This is a unit description. I.e. a bit of flavor text about the unit that gives an insight into the lore of the game. This takes the form of a quote - from a book, diary, journal, etc - followed by the source. A lot of them try to get across some of the humor Triumph is known for.
The person of the quote is male
This is the name of a unit.

“We should have killed the specimen when it was weak. This Remora ravenously hungers for us all. I’ve seen it latch onto the campus security forces, completely draining them of life, only to then watch as their husks explode into a Psionica Tick obedient to the Remora. We sought shelter, but it hurled deadly mind-battering crystals that wracked us with nightmarish regret and agony. I’m afraid that, when you find this record, our school will be nothing more than a ruin, and this whole compound will be overrun with psychic parasites.” – Sully Chesterfield, “RV-8435355M: Pangalactic Academy Journal Entries”

“我们就应该趁着那个标本虚弱的时候杀死它。这只印鱼贪婪地想要吸食掉我们。我曾见过它紧紧抓住一支校园安全队，然后彻底抽干了他们的生命，然后眼睁睁地看着他们的躯壳爆炸开来，变成一只只听从印鱼命令的灵能蜱虫。我们四处寻找掩体，但它却扔来致命的心灵打击水晶，以恶梦般的悔恨和痛苦折磨我们。恐怕当你发现这份记录时，我们的学校已经变成一片虚无了，整个校园都将被这些灵能寄生虫所占领。”——萨利·切斯特菲尔德，“RV-8435355M：泛银河系学院日志条目”

This is a unit description. I.e. a bit of flavor text about the unit that gives an insight into the lore of the game. This takes the form of a quote - from a book, diary, journal, etc - followed by the source. A lot of them try to get across some of the humor Triumph is known for.
The person of the quote is male
This is the name of a unit.

“Foremen claim that native Kir’Ko hives are stirring up conflict with our mining operation. The bugs claim Cosmite deposits are the bodies of gods long dead. Like most corpses, creatures feed on the decomposing remains. Our crew tried to ignore their paranoid superstitions, but some have nightmares of pulsating creatures of crimson crystal tunneling into their minds. They say it’s some kind of psionic parasite, capable of latching onto a host and siphoning life. Executives assert it’s a Kir’Ko hoax, but miners still whisper of Psionica Leeches.” – Tawny Walden, “RV-3482966W: Cosmicom Mining, Personnel Health Assessment”

“工头们声称，当地的奇尔寇正在对我们的采矿作业挑起冲突。这些虫子声称，宇宙合金是早已死去的神明的身体。这些生物以腐烂的残骸为食，比如尸体。我们的人员试图无视他们的偏执迷信，但有些人会做恶梦，梦到悸动的生物从深红色的水晶隧道钻入他们的大脑。他们说这是某种灵能寄生虫，能够吸附在寄主身上并汲取生命。高管们断言这是奇尔寇的骗局，但矿工们仍在小声谈论着灵能水蛭的传闻。”——陶尼·瓦尔登，“RV-3482966W：宇宙合金开采，人员健康评估”
